い.Definition: to receive, to take food or drink (hum)
as well as one can, with utmost effort
(hon) to be, to come, to go

お.Definition: to be late, to be delayed
to perform, to do, to carry out
to get angry, to be angry
to be surprised, to be astonished
calling on someone who is ill, enquiry
to descend a mountain, to (descend) go down stairs
to be (polite version of いる)
to break, to fold, to pick a flower
to break, to be folded, to give in, to turn (a corner)

か.Definition: assembly hall, meeting place, the grounds
to change, to alter, to vary
to hang, to put on (eg wall)
to decorate, to ornament, to adorn
to tidy up, to put in order, to put away
(1) to go back and forth, (2) to commute
to change, to be transformed, to vary

が.Definition: gasoline stand, gas station, petrol station
to try one's best, to persist

き.Definition: to be heard, to be audible
to be decided, to be settled

く.Definition: to get dark, to come to an end

け.Definition: to injure (to animate object), to harm

こ.Definition: (1) this person, (2) this direction, (3) this side, (4) thereafter

さ.Definition: to search, to seek, to look for
to hang, to lower, to move back
to make noise, to clamor, to be excited

し.Definition: to grab a meal, to eat

す.Definition: terrific, amazing, to a great extent
to make progress, to advance, to proceed

ず.Definition: straight, quickly, all of a sudden

そ.Definition: to raise, to rear, to bring up
such, like that, that sort of

た.Definition: to add (numbers), to do (eg. one's business)
to be sufficient, to be enough

ち.Definition: junior high school, middle school pupil

つ.Definition: to catch, to arrest, to seize
to be started, to be switched on
to soak, to moisten, to pickle
to continue, to keep up, to keep on

て.Definition: to help, to assist, to take part in

で.Definition: if at all possible, as much as possible

と.Definition: on the way, en route, midway
limited express (train, faster than an express)

な.Definition: to be fixed, to be repaired
to sound, to ring, to resound

に.Definition: entry to school or university, matriculation
to enter a school or university

ぱ.Definition: part time (esp female part time employees)

ひ.Definition: to grow cold, to get chilly, to cool down
lunch break, noon recess, noon rest period
to pick up, to find, to gather

ふ.Definition: (1) generally, ordinarily, usually, (2) train that stops at every station
to grow fat (stout, plump), to become fat
to step on, to tread on

ま.Definition: to err, to make a mistake

み.Definition: to be seen, to be in sight
(uk) to be found, to be discovered

や.Definition: to be helpful, to be useful
to burn, to be roasted, to be sunburnt
to become thin, to lose weight
to end, to stop, to resign

よ.Definition: to get dirty, to become dirty
to be delighted, to be glad

わ.Definition: to be divided, to part from, to separate
to boil, to grow hot, to get excited
